explains: adj. 辩证的；辩证法的；方言的
wordGroup: dialectical materialism n. 辩证唯物主义

sentences.en: The essence of dialectical thought is division.
sentences.cn: 辩证思想的实质是二分法。

sentences.en: Among them is a relationship of dialectical unity.
sentences.cn: 它们之间是辩证统一的关系。

sentences.en: Dialectical analyzing the nature of sophism, it is a mistake.
sentences.cn: 从辩证法上来分析，诡辩的本质是一种谬误。
